Column.name: Nonsentient
Column.notes: Denotes a creature that is non-sentient and does take over actions like attacking, plundering, aggro'ing, etc

Column.name: MoveAfterAttacking
Column.notes: If set true, unit spends 1 move to make an attack and may use remaining moves to continue to move and/or attack

Column.name: RevealInFog
Column.notes: If true, unit will be revealed even in grey fog

Column.name: AffectFriendly
Column.notes: Ability will affect units of the same team or an allied team

Column.name: AffectNeutral
Column.notes: Ability will affect units of a different team that are not at war

Column.name: AffectEnemy
Column.notes: Ability will affect units of a hostile team

Column.name: AffectAlien
Column.notes: Ability will affect Alien units (without regard to Alien opinion/hostility)

Column.name: AOEDamage
Column.notes: Flat change to unit damage. Set this to negative to apply a healing effect

Column.name: RangeOverride
Column.notes: Special range at which this action can be done. If left at -1, the unit's default Range stat will be used
